item.title: My first blog
item.description: Hello! This is my first time using EasyRSS

item.title: Exceptions of using XSL stylesheet
item.description: When using XSL stylesheet, remember that Mozilla does not parse HTML tags. Though IE6 accepts HTML tags and parses them, Mozilla does not (and will never do). So using disable-output-escaping="yes" parameter in <xsl:text> and <xsl:value-of> would be effective in MSIE only.
